heroDescription: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
overviewDescription: At BitumAsphalt, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
informationCollectionDescription: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:
dataUsageDescription: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
communication: Communicating with you about our products and services
improvement: Improving our website and user experience
legalCompliance: Complying with legal obligations and regulations
dataProtectionDescription: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information:
encryptionDescription: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols
accessControlDescription: Strict access controls limit who can view and modify your personal information
yourRightsDescription: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:
rightAccess: Right to access your personal data
rightDeletion: Right to request deletion of your data
rightObjection: Right to object to certain processing activities
contactDescription: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your personal information, please don't hesitate to contact us.
